context: Financial services firm facing regulatory changes requiring enhanced compliance monitoring capabilities

request.purpose: Upgrade compliance management platform to meet new regulatory requirements
request.justification: New EU regulations require advanced transaction monitoring, current system lacks capabilities

decision_process.outcome: Clear requirements identified, three vendor options shortlisted
Preferred vendor selected, integration plan developed

business_impact.expected_outcome: Ensure regulatory compliance, reduce audit findings by 40%
business_impact.projected_value: $800K in avoided penalties and improved efficiency

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: System operational, compliance monitoring improved by 35%
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: Audit findings reduced by 45%, efficiency gains of $300K

lessons_learned: Early involvement of IT security team prevented integration issues, phased rollout approach successful
